featured.text: A new relationship is like an embryo that requires time, care and attention to grow into whatever may evolve.

definition.zh_def: 胚胎：在早期發育階段的生物，通常指受精卵發育成的早期形態。
definition.en_def: An embryo is an early stage of development in multicellular organisms, typically referring to the early form of a fertilized egg.
definition.example: The scientist studied the embryo to understand its development process.
